name: Hollywood Inn Express LAX

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: A Stinkhole

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Do NOT stay here

reviews.text: I stayed here for 8 hours to catch my morning flight. I saved by getting a low rate and they have a shuttle. I would not pick this place for a longer stay. The check in clerk made me wait while he took care of other paperwork during check in, though the morning guy was much friendlier. The bed was decent and the room was big. The neighborhood is horrid. The TV shows everything with a blue tint and most channels don't come in. The juice machine for breakfast is out of order. If you want to get away ftom the aitport for a few hours and sleep, it will do the job. To stay any longer should be out of the question. The are clearly squeezing every last penny out of this place.
reviews.title: Only stay here if you are on a layover

reviews.text: DO NOT STAY HERE!!!! we booked a room here through hotels.com and had no idea what is was like.. the room looked ok when we walked in or so we thought... i walked over to the window to open it and the wallpaper on the walls which were probably 100 years old was lifting and had massive mold growing underneath it.. there was no bath tub plug to take a bath!!! and the room stunk horribly! we had asked the owner if there was anything he could do ?? he had told us that he couldnt do anything and that they dont put bath tub plugs in any of the rooms?? he was very rude!!! also this dump has no ice machine!! we were told it had been broken for a month and we needed to walk over to the liquor store if we wanted ice??????!!!! we ended up leaving and was out 160 bucks!! we went down the street to motel 6 which was wayyyyyy cleaner and looked like a fricken marriot compared to that dump!! dooo notttt stay at this place!! its horrible,dirty moldy and stinky!!! terrible place to stay
reviews.title: mold heaven!!!!!
HORRIBLE
reviews.text: Omg, pls stay in your car! This hotel is awful, I was given a smoking room and asked to be changed and all of a sudden he said it was completely booked! They told me to sit outside and said the supervisor was busy and it would take a while for them to come spray the room! We sat outside for over an hour and took our clothes and left to Hollywood and left the door wide open. There is NO breakfast! These Indians with the red dot have coffe and toast! That is not a breAkfast! When you walk down the stairs it smells like curry! Plssss!!!!! Go elsewhere! The bed had a big dent in in the the person sleeping with me rolled all the way to my side and was literally sleeping on me! Hotels.com should eliminate doing business with these stingy, dirty, and not to mention rude people!
This hotel is clean, quiet, safe, and run by an excellent and attentive staff. I will stay here anytime I'm in the LAX area.
reviews.title: Excellent property!

reviews.text: I'm not usually a picky person when it comes to hotels because I try to find low budget ones. However, I could not tolerate the rude manager that ruined the start to our vacation. We asked him for directions and he was not only unhelpful, he told us to do our homework and find it ourselves. He laughed at us for not knowing which direction to go and treated us like children. It was our first time in the area and he mocked us for not knowing our way around. I would highly recommend staying at another hotel whose staff will respect you and help answer your questions.
reviews.title: Low quality customer service

aka: Ramada Limited-Lax Airport East Hotel Inglewood
